# @param {Integer[]} max_heights
# @return {Integer}
def maximum_sum_of_heights(max_heights)
  n = max_heights.size
  left_max = Array.new(n, 0)
  right_max = Array.new(n, 0)
  
  # Forward pass to calculate max heights in a non-decreasing manner
  left_max[0] = max_heights[0]
  (1...n).each do |i|
    left_max[i] = [left_max[i-1] + 1, max_heights[i]].min
  end

  # Backward pass to calculate max heights in a non-increasing manner
  right_max[n-1] = max_heights[n-1]
  (n-2).downto(0) do |i|
    right_max[i] = [right_max[i+1] + 1, max_heights[i]].min
  end

  # Calculate the minimum of left_max and right_max for each tower to ensure mountain shape
  max_sum = 0
  (0...n).each do |i|
    max_sum += [left_max[i], right_max[i]].min
  end

  max_sum
end
